author: Damini Nath
title: New Parliament design to take a few more weeks due to lockdown
description: Trying to address MPs’ concerns like absence of a separate Central Hall, says architect.
content:
The design for the new Parliament building that the Centre is hoping to complete by August 2022 could be delayed by a few weeks as the country remains in lock-down, according to sources.
The Union Housing and Urban Affairs Ministrys construction agency, the … [+3098 chars]
